data.name: The Divine Speaker - 2019 Art Collection
data.detailed_description:
A collection of promotional illustrations created for the Boys' Love Visual Novel "The Divine Speaker".
Contains 37 pages of artworks. Some are 18+.
data.about_the_game:
A collection of promotional illustrations created for the Boys' Love Visual Novel "The Divine Speaker".
Contains 37 pages of artworks. Some are 18+.
data.short_description: A short collection of illustrations from the Visual Novel, The Divine Speaker.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
